† Medoevididae [†Medoeviidae] Borgen & Nakrem 2016: 463 (family) †
Medoevia Lebedev 1995
[although family-group names proposed after 1999 cannot be corrected (Arts 29.3.3 and 29.4), I think a simple typing error can explain the incorrectly spelled family-group name; the correct stem is deemed to be Medoevi-]
